tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE clinical_trials_participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(255),
  participant_age INT,
  participant_gender VARCHAR(10),
  participation_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    enrollment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE activities (
    activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id UUID,
    activity_name VARCHAR(50),
    activity_date DATE,
    duration_minutes INT
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    enrollment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE activities (
    activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(50),
    activity_date DATE,
    duration INT,
    participant_id UUID REFERENCES participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trial_info (
    trial_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    trial_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    total_participants INT
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(255),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    age INT,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE trials (
    trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trial_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE participant_trials (
    participant_id INT,
    trial_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants(participant_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (trial_id) REFERENCES trials(trial_id)
)

CREATE TABLE participant_activities (
    participant_id INT,
    activity_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants(participant_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES activities(activity_id)
)
